summary: WINDSHIELD WIPERS STOPPED IN MIDDLE OF WINDSHIELD DURING A RAINSTORM.  WIPER BLADE ON DRIVER SIDE THEN HUNG BELOW THE WINDSHIELD RUBBER AND WOULD NOT START AGAIN.  WIPE IS 32 INCHES LONG AND "SAGS" ON EACH PASS.  ENTIRE ASSEMBLY HAS BEEN REPLACED, INCLUDING THE BLADES, AND THIS CONTINUES TO HAPPEN.  OTHERS HAVE HAD THE SAME PROBLEM  AS US ON 2007 DAMON CHALLENGER CLASS A MOTORHOMES AS REPORTED ON THE WEBSITE WWW.IRV2.COM.  DAMON DOES NOT HAVE A FIX.  THIS IS A SAFETY HAZARD ON 2007 -2012 MODELS.*JB

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 DAMON CHALLENGER RV.  WHILE DRIVING DOWN A HILL AT 25 MPH HE APPLIED PRESSURE TO THE BRAKE PEDAL, BUT THE ELECTRICAL BRAKES FAILED.  HE HAD TO USE THE PARKING BRAKE TO DECELERATE. THE VEHICLE WAS IN THE PROCESS OF BEING TOWED TO A DEALER FOR INSPECTION.  THE CURRENT AND THE FAILURE MILEAGES WERE 13,000.
